content.HEAD: Dear
content.CONTENT: You and your family are invited! It's our pleasure to have you join our big day!
content.ADDRESS: Address: Addison Oaks Buhl Estate (1480 W Romeo Rd, Oakland, MI  48367)
content.TIME: Time: welcome guests from 4:50 PM (ceremony starting from 5:20 PM)
content.ACCEPT: If you accept our invitation, please click the button below to fill out your guest information:
